scripts.diff:a: git diff --quiet `git merge-base origin/master HEAD`..HEAD -- packages/a
scripts.diff:b: git diff --quiet `git merge-base origin/master HEAD`..HEAD -- packages/b
scripts.bump:a: npm run diff:a || npm version patch -w @stephaniez_rangle/a
scripts.bump:b: npm run diff:b || npm version patch -w @stephaniez_rangle/b
scripts.publish:a: npm run diff:a || npm publish -w @stephaniez_rangle/a --access public
scripts.publish:b: npm run diff:b || npm publish -w @stephaniez_rangle/b --access public
